greeting: Hello! Welcome to our Tauri App.
newsPanel.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred while loading news.
investStyle.alertAddFailed: Failed to add investment style. Check console for details.
investStyle.alertDeleteFailed: Failed to delete style. Check console for details.
investStyle.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete style: "{{description}}"?
portfolio.alertAddFailed: Failed to add holding. Check console for details.
portfolio.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this holding?
portfolio.placeholderName: e.g., Checking Account, VTI, Treasury Bonds
calendar.alertDeleteFailed: Failed to delete event. Check console for details.
calendar.alertAddFailed: Failed to add event. Check console for details.
calendar.alertSelectDate: Please select a date on the calendar first.
calendar.alertProvideTitle: Please provide a title for the event.
calendar.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"?
calendar.selectDatePrompt: Select a date to see events.
systemConfig.alertSaveFailed: Failed to save configuration. Check console for details.
chat.initialGreeting: Hello! How can I help you today?
chat.alertConfigureApiKey: Please configure your API Key in the settings panel first.
chat.confirmNewChat: Are you sure you want to start a new chat? The current conversation will be cleared.
chat.summarizePromptHeader: Please summarize the key financial, economic, stock price change, and political news from the following headlines. Ignore irrelevant items:
chat.summarizeNoNews: No news headlines found to summarize.
chat.alertAddEventFailed: Failed to add event to calendar.
chat.advicePromptHeader: Based on the following information, please provide investment suggestions:
chat.advicePromptInstruction: Provide concise and actionable advice considering the current date, upcoming events, portfolio holdings, and preferred investment style.
chat.systemPrompt: You are an investment and financial expert. Please provide investment advice based on today's news, past events, and predictable future events, considering the user's portfolio and investment style.
